name: The Princess Superhero Girls
description:
Hello Kids..!! Are you ready to save the world? Then come and help this Super girl in her rescue adventures mission. But First of all, you have to meet her and to help design the new superhero costume. Then perform some interesting activities like to give her refreshing bubble bath, wash her hair and cook some tasty food. Next, start your rescue mission and save the city from Fire Monster. Don't forget to check the mailbox. Oh..!! There is also another monster that is trash monster and he is trashing the city, so let's stop him using your superpower and clean up the city. Play and enjoy this Princess superhero girls game and learn how to save the environment.
Key features

- Unique costume of princess superhero
- Perform different tasks by using tools
- Protect the city from monsters
- Cook some yummy food
- Increasing your cleaning skills
